PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
_BDB_CommissioningMode Struct Reference

Used as a parameter to the top level commissioning procedure and specifies the commissioning methods and options taken when commissioning is invoked, represented by each bit from the least significant bit to the most significant bit. More...

#include <bdb.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t reserved: 4
uint8_t findingAndBinding: 1
uint8_t nwkFormation: 1
uint8_t nwkSteering: 1
uint8_t touchlink: 1

Detailed Description

Used as a parameter to the top level commissioning procedure and specifies the commissioning methods and options taken when commissioning is invoked, represented by each bit from the least significant bit to the most significant bit.
